articles.author: Sophie Curtis
articles.title: Extinct lizard-like reptile that lived among dinosaurs 150 million years ago is unearthed - Daily Mail
articles.description: The new species, named Opisthiamimus gregori, measured about 6 inches from nose to tail. It lived alongside dinosaurs like Stegosaurus and Allosaurus in North America 150m years ago.
articles.content:
An extinct reptile that lived among the dinosaurs 150 million years ago has been unearthed in the badlands of Wyoming.
The new species, named Opisthiamimus gregori, measured about 6 inches from nose… [+7615 chars]

articles.title: Medical videos on YouTube often provide incomplete information - EurekAlert
articles.description: Implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) information on YouTube is of low and highly-variable quality, according to research presented at the American College of Cardiology (ACC) Quality Summit 2022.
